fr.brief: Bibliothèque logiciel pour la résolution des jeux stochastiques.
fr.description: Bibliothèque logiciel contenant un ensemble d'outils et d'algorithmes pour la résolution des jeux stochastiques.

us.brief: Solver and library for solving stochastic games.
us.description: SDMS (Sequential Decision Making Studio) is a software library containing a set of tools and algorithms for solving sequential decision making problems. The platform is based on algorithmic choices, resulting from a detailed analysis of the limitations of current methods.
